text: The 2003 Wagner Seahawks football team represented Wagner College in the 2003 NCAA Division I-AA football season as a member of the Northeast Conference (NEC). The Seahawks were led by 23rd-year head coach Walt Hameline and played their home games at Wagner College Stadium. Wagner finished the season 6–5 overall and 3–4 in NEC play to tie for fifth place. ==Schedule== ==References== Wagner Category:Wagner Seahawks football seasons Wagner Seahawks football
title: 2003 Wagner Seahawks football team
